title: The Lone Ranger. Vol. 1
creator_credit: John English, William Witney and Republic Pictures Corporation
brief_description: An extremely rare serial find—the first filmed story of the mysterious masked hero of the plains, starring Lee Powell and Chief Thundercloud. NOTICE: The quality of the sound and picture of this print are only fair. This is the only complete version of this serial available; the two previously missing chapters are in English with Spanish subtitles.
